thread.title: Who were the Shore's best linebackers, defensive backs?
thread.title_full: Who were the Shore's best linebackers, defensive backs?

author: app.com
title: Who were the Shore's best linebackers, defensive backs?
text:
MORE It’s never easy identifying some of the greatest players ever when you’re dealing with a subject so many people are so passionate about.
And that’s absolutely the case when it comes to Shore Conference football.
Over the past few weeks I’ve been inundated with input from fans on the subject. In addition, I’ve solicited advice from long-time observers and scoured our archives for nuggets of information, all in an effort to identify some of the athletes who have helped drive that passion over the years.
In the first of our five-part series, we’re looking at some of the best linebackers and defensive backs ever to patrol the area gridiron. The names I came up with span a half-century, provide glimpses into the rich history of local high school football and are sure to spark some fond memories.
In the coming weeks, we will be rolling out the rest of our series, including linemen, both offensive and defensive (Oct. 20), receivers (Oct. 27), quarterbacks (Nov. 3) and running backs (Nov. 10). And it’s not too late to provide input, so feel free to contact me: via email at sedelson@gannettnj.com ; follow me on Twitter and send me a direct message; or go to my Facebook page and comment.
